00022 #include "internal.h"
00023 #include "util.h"
00024 #include <dfsch/dfsch.h>
00025 #include <dfsch/number.h>
00026 
00027 #include <time.h>
00028 #include <sys/times.h>
00029 #include <unistd.h>
00030 #include <limits.h>
00031 
00032 
00033 typedef struct decoded_time_t {
00034   dfsch_type_t* type;
00035   struct tm tm;
00036 } decoded_time_t;
00037 
00038 static int decoded_time_equal_p(decoded_time_t* a, decoded_time_t* b){
00039   return (a->tm.tm_sec == b->tm.tm_sec)
00040     && (a->tm.tm_min == b->tm.tm_min)
00041     && (a->tm.tm_hour == b->tm.tm_hour)
00042     && (a->tm.tm_mday == b->tm.tm_mday)
00043     && (a->tm.tm_mon == b->tm.tm_mon)
00044     && (a->tm.tm_year == b->tm.tm_year)
00045     && (a->tm.tm_wday == b->tm.tm_wday)
00046     && (a->tm.tm_yday == b->tm.tm_yday)
00047     && (a->tm.tm_isdst == b->tm.tm_isdst);
00048 }
00049 
00050 static void decoded_time_write(decoded_time_t* time, 
00051                                dfsch_writer_state_t* state){
00052   dfsch_write_unreadable(state, time, "%04d-%02d-%02dT%02d:%02d:%02d",
00053                          time->tm.tm_year+1900, time->tm.tm_mon+1, 
00054                          time->tm.tm_mday,
00055                          time->tm.tm_hour, time->tm.tm_min, time->tm.tm_sec);
00056 }
00057 
00058 static dfsch_object_t* decoded_time_apply(decoded_time_t* time, 
00059                                           dfsch_object_t* args,
00060                                           dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00061   dfsch_object_t* selector;
00062 
00063   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, selector);
00064   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00065 
00066   if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "sec")){
00067     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_sec);
00068   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "min")){
00069     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_min);
00070   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "hour")){
00071     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_hour);
00072   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "date")){
00073     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_mday);
00074   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "month")){
00075     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_mon + 1);
00076   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "year")){
00077     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_year + 1900);
00078   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "day")){
00079     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_wday);
00080   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "year-day")){
00081     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_yday + 1);
00082   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "dst?")){
00083     return dfsch_bool(time->tm.tm_isdst == 1);
00084   }
00085 
00086   dfsch_error("exception:no-such-decoded-time-field", selector);
00087 }
00088 
00089 size_t decoded_time_hash(decoded_time_t* time){
00090   return time->tm.tm_sec ^ time->tm.tm_min ^ time->tm.tm_hour 
00091     ^ time->tm.tm_yday ^ time->tm.tm_year;
00092 }
00093 
00094 dfsch_type_t decoded_time_type = {
00095   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00096   NULL,
00097   sizeof(decoded_time_t),
00098   "decoded-time",
00099   (dfsch_type_equal_p_t)decoded_time_equal_p,
00100   (dfsch_type_write_t)decoded_time_write,
00101   (dfsch_type_apply_t)decoded_time_apply,
00102   (dfsch_type_hash_t)decoded_time_hash
00103 };
00104 
00105 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_decoded_time(){
00106   return dfsch_make_object(&decoded_time_type);
00107 }
00108 
00109 struct tm* dfsch_decoded_time_get_tm(dfsch_object_t* time){
00110   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(time) != &decoded_time_type){
00111     dfsch_error("exception:not-a-decoded-time", time);
00112   }
00113 
00114   return &(((decoded_time_t*)time)->tm);
00115 }
00116 
00117 static dfsch_object_t* native_decode_universal_time(void* baton,
00118                                                     dfsch_object_t* args,
00119                                                     dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00120   time_t time;
00121   dfsch_object_t* utc;
00122   dfsch_object_t* ret;
00123 
00124   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, time);
00125   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, utc, NULL);
00126   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00127 
00128   ret = dfsch_make_decoded_time();
00129 
00130   if (utc){
00131     gmtime_r(&time, dfsch_decoded_time_get_tm(ret));
00132   } else {
00133     localtime_r(&time, dfsch_decoded_time_get_tm(ret));
00134   }
00135  
00136   return ret;
00137 }
00138 
00139 static dfsch_object_t* native_encode_universal_time(void* baton,
00140                                                     dfsch_object_t* args,
00141                                                     dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00142   struct tm tm;
00143   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, tm.tm_sec);
00144   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, tm.tm_min);
00145   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, tm.tm_hour);
00146 
00147   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, tm.tm_mday);
00148   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, tm.tm_mon);
00149   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, tm.tm_year);
00150   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00151 
00152   tm.tm_mon -= 1;
00153   tm.tm_year -= 1900;
00154 
00155   return dfsch_make_number_from_long(mktime(&tm));
00156 }
00157 
00158 static dfsch_object_t* native_get_decoded_time(void* baton,
00159                                                dfsch_object_t* args,
00160                                                dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00161   time_t t;
00162   dfsch_object_t* utc;
00163   dfsch_object_t* ret;
00164 
00165   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, utc, NULL);
00166   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00167 
00168   ret = dfsch_make_decoded_time();
00169 
00170   t = time(NULL);
00171 
00172   if (utc){
00173     gmtime_r(&t, dfsch_decoded_time_get_tm(ret));
00174   } else {
00175     localtime_r(&t, dfsch_decoded_time_get_tm(ret));
00176   }
00177  
00178   return ret;  
00179 }
00180 
00181 static dfsch_object_t* native_get_universal_time(void* baton,
00182                                                  dfsch_object_t* args,
00183                                                  dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00184   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00185 
00186   return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time(NULL));
00187 }
00188 
00189 static dfsch_object_t* native_iso_format_time(void* baton,
00190                                               dfsch_object_t* args,
00191                                               dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00192   char t = ' ';
00193   dfsch_object_t* use_t;
00194   dfsch_object_t* time;
00195   struct tm* tm;
00196   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, time);
00197   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, use_t, NULL);
00198   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00199 
00200   if (use_t){
00201     t = 'T';
00202   }
00203 
00204   tm = dfsch_decoded_time_get_tm(time);
00205 
00206   return dfsch_make_string_cstr(saprintf("%04d-%02d-%02d%c%02d:%02d:%02d",
00207                                          tm->tm_year+1900, tm->tm_mon+1, 
00208                                          tm->tm_mday, t,
00209                                          tm->tm_hour, tm->tm_min, tm->tm_sec));
00210 }
00211 
00212 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(get_internal_real_time, NULL){
00213   struct tms t;
00214   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00215 
00216   return dfsch_make_number_from_long(times(&t) & LONG_MAX);
00217 }
00218 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(get_internal_run_time, NULL){
00219   struct tms t;
00220   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00221 
00222   times(&t);
00223 
00224   return dfsch_make_number_from_long((t.tms_utime + t.tms_stime) & LONG_MAX);
00225 }
00226 
00227 
00228 
00229 void dfsch__system_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00230   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<decoded-time>", &decoded_time_type);
00231 
00232 
00233   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "decode-universal-time", 
00234                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_decode_universal_time, NULL));
00235   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "encode-universal-time", 
00236                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_encode_universal_time, NULL));
00237   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "get-decoded-time", 
00238                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_get_decoded_time, NULL));
00239   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "get-universal-time", 
00240                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_get_universal_time, NULL));
00241   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "iso-format-time", 
00242                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_iso_format_time, NULL));
00243   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "get-internal-real-time", 
00244                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(get_internal_real_time));
00245   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "get-internal-run-time", 
00246                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(get_internal_run_time));
00247   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "internal-time-units-per-second", 
00248                     dfsch_make_number_from_long(sysconf(_SC_CLK_TCK)));
00249 }
